[PLOT]

Set in strife-ridden, 20th-century Colombia, a modern-day 
interpretation of Sophocles' tragedies which includes: The 
Plague of Thebes, Oedipus and other aspects of the classical 
writer's works as it relates to this Latin American country's 
general state of violence--freedom fighting guerillas, drug 
cartels, paramilitary organizations, landowners and the 
government, and relentless civic unrest.
